entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
